    public class SpinBox
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table
    A SpinBox widget that users can use to select an integer value that lies within an allowed range
    Author:
    jcn509

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        text - The text that is to be displayed to the left of the SpinBox value
        initialValue - The initial value of the SpinBox
        minValue - The smallest number that the user can select
        maxValue - The largest number that the user can select
